name: Document
description: Represents a file that a user can upload and store in Salesforce.
summary:
The **Document** object in Salesforce is designed to store and manage files used within the Salesforce ecosystem. It includes a variety of attributes that describe the document's properties, metadata, and access controls. Hereâ€™s a summary of its key attributes:

1. **Id**: Unique identifier for the document.
2. **FolderId**: Reference to the folder containing the document.
3. **IsDeleted**: Indicates whether the document is deleted (boolean).
4. **Name**: The name of the document (string).
5. **DeveloperName**: Developer-assigned name for the document (string).
6. **NamespacePrefix**: Namespace prefix associated with the document (string).
7. **ContentType**: MIME type of the document content (string).
8. **Type**: Type or category of the document (string).
9. **IsPublic**: Indicates if the document is publicly accessible (boolean).
10. **BodyLength**: Length of the document body in bytes (int).
11. **Body**: The content of the document, stored as base64 encoded data (base64).
12. **Url**: URL for accessing the document (string).
13. **Description**: Additional description or notes about the document (textarea).
14. **Keywords**: Keywords associated with the document for search purposes (string).
15. **IsInternalUseOnly**: Indicates if the document is for internal use only (boolean).
16. **AuthorId**: Reference to the user who authored the document.
17. **CreatedDate**: Date and time when the document was created (datetime).
18. **CreatedById**: Reference to the user who created the document.
19. **LastModifiedDate**: Date and time when the document was last modified (datetime).
20. **LastModifiedById**: Reference to the user who last modified the document.
21. **SystemModstamp**: System-generated timestamp for the last modification.
22. **IsBodySearchable**: Indicates if the document body is searchable (boolean).
23. **LastViewedDate**: Date and time when the document was last viewed (datetime).
24. **LastReferencedDate**: Date and time when the document was last referenced (datetime).

This comprehensive set of attributes allows Salesforce users to efficiently store, manage, and retrieve documents, support document searchability, control access, and track document usage and modifications.
label: Document
